comment.author: 64700050@N04
comment._content: This is a date printed on the back of the print (11/5/14). 11 is the day/5 is the month/ and 14 for 1914. This is the european form of writing writing dates.

comment.author: 53461717@N08
comment._content:
The handwritting of the scratched date is quite alike than other George Bain photos.  If the scrateched date is mirror turned, it is likely 11/7/14.  And if it was scratched by Bain it would say November 7, 1914.
Dr. Roberto Duarte
Plastic Surgeon
